SEARCH
Package businessLayer

Class OrderDetailManager

java.lang.Object
businessLayer.OrderDetailManager
public class OrderDetailManager extends Object
The OrderDetailManager class is responsible for managing order details in the application. It uses ProductManager to perform its operations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    OrderDetailManager()
    Constructs a new OrderDetailManager with a new OrderDetailDao and ProductManager.

    • createOrderDetail

      public OrderDetail createOrderDetail(int orderdetailId, int ordertableId, int productId, int quantity) throws SQLException
      Creates a new order detail with the given order detail ID, order table ID, product ID, and quantity.
      Parameters:
      orderdetailId - the ID of the order detail
      ordertableId - the ID of the order table
      productId - the ID of the product
      quantity - the quantity of the product
      Returns:
      the created order detail
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while creating the order detail
